test.query: SELECT Title FROM hits_10m_single PREWHERE WatchID % 2 = 1 WHERE UserID = 10000 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase FROM hits_100m_single PREWHERE SearchPhrase <> '' FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase FROM hits_100m_single PREWHERE SearchPhrase <> '' ORDER BY EventTime LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
SELECT SearchPhrase, MIN(URL), COUNT(*) AS c FROM hits_100m_single PREWHERE URL LIKE '%google%' AND SearchPhrase <> '' GROUP BY SearchPhrase ORDER BY c DESC LIMIT 10 FORMAT Null
